Special: Inaccurate, Shocking

Note: Fires Crackling bolts of energy. When a character wielding the weapon would inflict multiple hits from a single attack of thie weapon, they instead resolve all of them as one single hit, combining damage (EG: 2 hits, 2d10+6 E damage)
